definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: That fire destroyed 38,000 acres and 21 homes.
sentences.chinese: 火火灾造成了3万8千英亩土地和21户住宅的损失。

sentences.english: They were appalled by the damage from the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他们对火灾所造成的损失感到震惊。

sentences.english: Her child burnt to death in the fire.
sentences.chinese: 她的孩子在火灾中烧死了。

sentences.english: The fire broke out on the morning of Dec. 23, 1991.
sentences.chinese: 这次火灾发生于1991年十二月二十三日的早晨。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki- moon has also extended his condolences.
sentences.chinese: 联合国秘书长潘基文也对巴西火灾遇难者表示哀悼。

sentences.english: Among all kinds of fuel-spilled-fires, pool fire under windy conditions is the most common one.
sentences.chinese: 典型的燃油泄漏火灾多是有风条件下的液态池火燃烧。

sentences.english: The wrack of the city was still hot from the fire.
sentences.chinese: 这城市的残骸，仍因火灾还是热的。

sentences.english: Fire also bring the people harm, so Shang King divined fire disasters.
sentences.chinese: “火”也会给人类造成极大危害，商王曾占卜火灾。

sentences.english: It is an important consist part of the FAS.
sentences.chinese: 它是火灾自动报警系统的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: If the water evaporates and the pot boils dry, it could cause a fire.
sentences.chinese: 如果水蒸发完，水壶烧干，有可能引起火灾。

sentences.english: I'd like to be a fireman because I want to put out fires.
sentences.chinese: 我想是一名消防队员，因为我想要扑灭火灾。

sentences.english: How to fire an event when a DialogBox got hided in GWT?
sentences.chinese: 如何火灾事件，当一个对话框就隐藏在GWT？

sentences.english: And there was 37 people died in there.
The numerical simulation for fire environment of PLG tank is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对液化气储罐的火灾环境的数值模拟研究。

sentences.english: Also it has carried on the elaboration to the metal packed tower fire accident and the prevention.
sentences.chinese: 还对金属填料塔火灾事故及预防进行了论述。

sentences.english: Post-earthquake fire causes significant harm to mankind.
sentences.chinese: 地震次生火灾对人类的危害极大。

definition: to catch fire/to cook/to get angry
